name: Hyper Universe - MVP Starter Pack
detailed_description:
This DLC is chock-full of the Hypers with the highest Win Rates so that you can smack down your competition. Get familiar with Yuna, Sapitelbub, Green Pit Bull, and Jack and rack up those victories. In addition, this pack gives you all of these Hypers’ unique equipment sets so that you can simply kick back and await the M-V-P chants from your adoring fans.

This pack contains the following:

Hypers
  • Yuna
  • Sapitelbub
  • Green Pit Bull
  • Jack

All of their unique equipment

To redeem this package in-game please do the following:
Instructions:
1. Purchase DLC
2. Launch client
3. Go to Hyper Shop
4. Click "Purchased Items"
5. Redeem Items

*Please note that any items already owned from this pack upon purchase will not be credited or refunded.

short_description: A wise man once said “Winning isn’t everything, it’s the only thing.” We tend to agree, so we put the Hypers with the highest Win Rates in one pack. Grab Yuna, Sapitelbub, Green Pit Bull, Jack and all of their unique equipment.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese-Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 32-bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9600 or better AMD Radeon HD 4830 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 650 or better AMD Radeon HD 7750 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
